sense.name: portion
sense.commentary: component part, component, piece - something determined in relation to something that includes it
sense.examples: He wanted to feel a part of something bigger than himself. I read a part of the manuscript. The smaller part is hard to reach. They analyzed the river into three parts. The rear part of the house. Glue the two parts together. Religions is in all parts of the world. The written part of the exam. The finance section of the company.

sense.name: our/his/my part
sense.commentary: so far as concerns the actor specified (can be replaced with "by him/us/my")
sense.examples: It requires vigilance on our part. They resisted every effort on his part.

sense.name: function
sense.commentary: office, role - the actions and activities assigned to or required or expected of a person or group
sense.examples: The part of a teacher is not to act as a babysitter. The government must do its part.

sense.name: theatrical role
sense.commentary: character, role, persona - an actor's portrayal of someone in a play
sense.examples: She played the part of Desdemona.

sense.name: share
sense.commentary: portion - assets belonging to or due to or contributed by an individual person or group
sense.examples: He wanted his part in cash. They all did their part of the work.

sense.name: voice
sense.commentary: the melody carried by a particular voice or instrument in polyphonic music
sense.examples: He tried to sing the tenor part.

sense.name: divide in hair
sense.commentary: a line where the hair is parted
sense.examples: His part was right in the middle. She moved her part to the side when she went out at night.
